ranking.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a position on a scale that shows how good someone or something is when compared with others
ranking.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: She is now fifth in the world rankings.
ranking.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a ranking person has a high, or the highest, position in an organization or is one of the best at an activity
ranking.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: the panel’s ranking Democrat, William Clay
He’s the ship’s ranking officer  (=the one with the highest rank).
ranking.translation[2].definitions[0].de: used to say where someone or something is on a scale that shows how good they are, or what position they have, compared with other people or things
ranking.translation[3].definitions[0].de: the position of something or someone in a list that has been arranged in order of quality or importance
ranking.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: The US recaptured from Germany the number one ranking among exporters.
ranking.translation[3].definitions[1].de: a list of things or people in order of quality or importance
ranking.translation[3].definitions[1].ex: a ranking of the 30 largest US cities on the basis of finance and management
